content: in all 16 st 16 round 8 slip_stitch in first st single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st repeat 4 times 24 round 9 skip the slip_stitch slip_stitch in the single_crochet single_crochet in the half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet in the double_crochet st single_crochet in the half_double_crochet slip_stitch in single_crochet repeat 4 times 28 slip_stitch in first st of previous round fasten_off fold foot so center toe lines up centered and the two toes on the side are folded in half stuff foot lightly and whip stitch foot closed pattern copyright ©2015 megan alameda all rights reserved pattern may not be altered copied redistributed or sold as your own pattern you may sell the finished product on a small scale as long as credit for pattern is given to happy hook designs and link to my sites are provided www facebook com/happyhookdesign page 3 of 3
